youtube.title: Blood Type Compatibility Explained: Who Can Donate to Whom?
youtube.description: Understanding blood type compatibility is crucial for medical emergencies and blood donations. This video breaks down which blood types can safely donate to others, covering O+, O-, A+, A-, B+, B-, AB+, and AB-. Learn the science behind universal donors and recipients! ü©∏
